coreAtributes.authorTag: "MFD by DSG Stationery Co. from 99% post-consumer material" is printed on the back.
coreAtributes.name: cardboard cuirass
coreAtributes.description: An extended cuirass made from cardboardium alloy with ailettes added for additional protection. Light and relatively nimble thanks to its partial articulation, its actual protective qualities leave something to be desired.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] head between the cardboard plates and [npc.verb(let)] the armour sit on [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.namePos] between the cardboard plates and [npc.verb(let)] the armour sit on [npc2.her] shoulders.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shove)] [npc2.namePos] between the cardboard plates and [npc.verb(secure)] the armour sit on [npc2.her] shoulders.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] the lower section of [npc.her] cardboard cuirass back down.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] the lower section of [npc.her] cardboard cuirass back down.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(flip)] the lower section of [npc.her] cardboard cuirass back down.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lift)] the lower section of [npc.her] cardboard cuirass back down.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lift)] the lower section of [npc2.namePos] cardboard cuirass back down.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(flip)] the lower section of [npc2.namePos] cardboard cuirass back down.
